column4: Question: hello i have an epson stylus CX5600 multifunctional but the system detects it as a CX5400 is there anyway i can change this so i make full use of my multifunctional?
Question: hello i have an epson stylus CX5600 multifunctional but the system detects it as a CX5400 is there anyway i can change this so i make full use of my multifunctional?
last five times ive been here, nobody has helped me, i think this will be sixth one..
Question: hello i have an epson stylus CX5600 multifunctional but the system detects it as a CX5400 is there anyway i can change this so i make full use of my multifunctional?
Attitude and how well your question is phrased have a lot to do with how good of an answer you get..
i dont think im having a bad attitude
I feel your statement was rude and offensive to the people that are here helping
yes, and i feel ofended each time i get here and nobody helps me
If someone knows the answer they will help.  You are free to leave and look for the answer elsewhere
You made an inflamatory statement and now complain when you get flamed.. go figure
Did you even look to see if xsane sees the scanner portion of your printer
it doesnt, thats why i need to change de driver
but idk how to do it
Did you read the supported hardware page to see if your printer is listed
yes, its not listed
then the additional features are not supported and it is using the driver that will let it work as a printer only
but before my last ubuntu reinstallation it worked fine and it recognized as the model it is, idk whats going wrong now
Hope you find an answer
thanks, do you know if theres any other way i can use the scanner?
nope
sorry to bother you again, can u tell me the argument for make please?
